criteria: Technical Implementation (30 marks): Correct implementation of all technical requirements with proper functionality
Code Quality and Organization (25 marks): Well-structured, readable code with appropriate commenting and documentation
User Interface and Design (20 marks): Intuitive user interface with good visual design and user experience
Testing and Error Handling (10 marks): Comprehensive testing and robust error handling throughout the application
Professional Standards (5 marks): Adherence to industry standards and best practices
assignment_requirements: Comprehensive programming project requiring technical implementation, good design, and professional standards
